game.title: Ancient Artifact
game.description: In a world of magic and mystery, an ancient artifact has been lost. As the chosen one, you must embark on a quest to find it and restore peace to the realm.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a magical amulet, and the respect of your people

task.description: Visit the wise Oracle to gain insight into the whereabouts of the ancient artifact.
Journey deep into the Forbidden Forest to retrieve the ancient Map of Legends, which holds the key to finding the artifact.
Follow the clues on the map to find the hidden Temple of Destiny, where the artifact is said to be located.
Battle the mighty Guardian Beast that protects the artifact and prove your worth.
Finally, retrieve the ancient artifact and bring it back to King Arthur to complete the quest.
